import React, {useEffect} from "react" import {useLocation} from "react-router-dom" import {ReactPlayer} from "react-player" import {useResultContext} from "../contexts/ResultContextProvider" import {Loading} from "./Loading" export const Results = () => { const {result, getResult, searchTerm, isLoading} = useResultContext() const location = useLocation() if (isLoading) useEffect(() => {}, []) switch (location.pathname) { case "/search": return (
{result?.results?.map(({link, title}, index) => (

{link.length > 30 ? link.substring(0, 30) : link}
))}
) break case "/images": return "searching" break case "/videos": return "searching" break case "/news": return "searching" break default: return "ERROR!" break } }
